dashboard_new_prompt.title: Create your first prompt
dashboard_new_prompt.body: Click “New prompt” to start building a structured teaching prompt.

new_request_text.title: Describe what you need
new_request_text.body: Write your teaching request in plain language. The assistant will turn it into a structured prompt.

new_submit_request.body: Click to analyze. If something important is missing, you’ll get a quick question instead of a bad prompt.
